product_name: The North Face Venture Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight, breathable and fully waterproof, The North Face Venture Rain Jacket for women delivers superb protection all year and packs small so it's always there when you need it. HyVent(R) EC is highly waterproof, windproof and breathable; all seams are fully sealed and a rip-and-stick stormflap keeps weather from penetrating the full-length zipper. HyVent EC substitutes natural (bean-derived) castor oil for 50% of the petroleum-based materials previously used in the manufacturing process. Pit zippers allow cooling airflow as your activity heats up. Fully adjustable brimmed hood allows good visibility; soft lining guards chin against abrasion. Jacket packs down and stows in left pocket. Zip hand pockets; hem drawcord and elastic cuffs with rip-and-stick closures. The North Face Venture Rain Jacket features modern lines and a regular fit for easy layering. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight, breathable and fully waterproof, The North Face Venture Rain Jacket for women delivers superb protection all year and packs small so it's always there when you need it.
